name: VR Solar System Cardboard
description:
Using this app, you will be observing all the planets and sun one by one, starting with the Earth and Moon. Plus, you will learn very interesting space and solar system facts in your journey.

Planet sizes are scaled to real world. There are 3D planets which are impressive on all cardboard compatible VR glasses.

You can even look closely to Sun and see how giant Jupiter is. Mesmerize with the beauty of the Saturn's rings. The app is educative and suitable for both parents and children.

Your ideas, comments are very important for us.

We want to develop a much better, useful application.

Please leave your comments. Thanks
